title: Math notes(sem 4)
content:
I ain't understanding shit in college 
So if any one has a good handwritten notes or anything / any drive link which has those please do send. As I realised that good notes makes the maths easier . (Hopefully the notes follows new syllabus )
Thankyou

comments.body:
Good notes doesn' tmake math easier 

Good practice does

Not to be rude 
But it definitely matters from where should i "practice"

Hey

No, its not about being rude or anything. This is a forum for discussions.

There are prescribed TB and reference books, right? That's what I use, and I have gotten an S grade in my sem this time

https://github.com/Pro696969/notessssss
These have some pretty good hand written notes for LA
